text: Journey Through a Body is a studio album by industrial music pioneers Throbbing Gristle, released in Germany in April 1982 through record label Walter Ulbricht Schallfolien. == Background == The album was recorded in Rome in March 1981 in the RAI studios without pre-planning any songs. The work was a piece of "radio art" commissioned by Italian national radio. == Release == Journey Through a Body was released in Germany in April 1982 through record label Walter Ulbricht Schallfolien. The album was reissued in the UK in 1993. == Critical reception == The Wire magazine called it the group's "scariest" album. == Track listing == == References == Category:Throbbing Gristle albums Category:1982 albums
title: Journey Through a Body
